Apostolic Church Fountain of Truth Mexico

2022 Report

data.title:
Apostolic Church Fountain of Truth Mexico

2022 Report
data.content:
It is a pleasure greeting you in the name of Christ from the most beautiful country in the world, Mexico!

By the grace of God, we continue to go forward with a fervent desire to serve the Lord better, sow the word of God and to reap souls for the Kingdom of Christ, and to make disciples throughout the nation. Currently there are 13 churches in 9 states.
    1. Tijuana, Baja California (Pastor Domingo Carlos)
    2. Ciudad México (Pastor Domingo Carlos)
    3. Mexicali, Baja California (Pastor Abraham Encinas)
    4. Culiacán, Sinaloa (Pastor Gilberto Rentería)
    5. Mazatlán, Sinaloa (Pastor Eliezer Barboza)
    6. San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosí (Pastor Gabriel Gálvez)
    7. Tehuacán, Puebla (Pastor Frank Díaz)
    8. Jala, Nayarit (Pastor Gabriel Gálvez)
    9. Juchitán, Oaxaca (Pastor Abraham Encinas)
    10. Muna, Yucatán (Pastor Isaac Cahuich)
    11. Playa del Carmen (Villas del Sol), Quintana Roo (Pastor Juan Domínguez)
    12. Playa del Carmen (Pescadores), Quintana Roo (Pastor Juan Domínguez)
    13. Cancún (Bonfil), Quintana Roo (Pastor Juan Domínguez)
We celebrated our National Pastoral Summit 2022 in the month of February in Mexico City where pastors and wives attended. It was there where we celebrated the prayer meetings, words and messages from Bishop Samuel Valverde, Sister Raquel, Pastor Martin Perez, and Pastor Domingo Carlos as well as two general celebrations. We also were able to do a while and a prayer for our nation in the city’s Zocalo. In addition, there was a service of ministerial initiation and ordination which took place in the launch of the church in Mexico City.

In September 3rd we also celebrated our Virtual Cell Summit 2022 with great success. This event turned into a global event with speakers being; Bishop Samuel Valverde, Bishop Elias Paez (Church La Mision, Mazatlán Sinaloa), Bishop Mario Oseguera (Church Ríos de Agua Viva), and Pastor Ernie Santana.

Our next National Summit, open to the general public, will be held March 28 to April 2 of the year of 2024 in the city of San Luis Potosi. Everyone is invited!

LOOKING FOR A PASTORAL FAMILY: In the name of Christ, we are looking for a pastor in the city and state of Mexico so that he can continue to form and strengthen the new born congregation that was launched in February of last year 2022. We are on the lookout for a man that is willing to go, fight, obey the calling, and to fulfill the mission.

Mexico City is a huge metropolis with a population of more than 22M, that awaits a chosen man that will strive and fulfill the vision to see every heart healed. Could it be you? The man for Mexico City? Then, it’s you that we are talking to. Go on and give yourself to the Lord and fulfill…. THE CALLING.

From:
    Pastor Domingo Carlos, FTC President Mexico
    Pastor Juan Domínguez, Secretar
    Pastor Abraham Encinas, Treasurer
    Pastor Gabriel Gálvez, Vocal
